introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is ゆれる, which you will often hear in everyday situations like when describing trees in the breeze, emotional fluctuations, or vehicles on bumpy roads.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "ゆれる" means to shake, sway, or tremble. It can refer to the physical motion of something moving back and forth, like a tree in the wind, or something metaphorical, like emotions that are unstable or fluctuating. It's a versatile word used in many contexts to describe any kind of wavering motion or feeling.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 揺さぶる : ゆさぶる : to shake
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "ゆれる" is "ゆさぶる." "ゆれる" generally means to sway or to shake slightly. "ゆさぶる," on the other hand, can imply a stronger, often deliberate shake or jolt, indicating a more vigorous or forceful action.
antonyms: 安定 : あんてい : stability
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word "ゆれる" are "こていする" and "あんていする." "こていする" means to fix or stabilize something so it doesn't move, while "あんていする" means to settle or stabilize, indicating stability or steadiness, opposite of the instability or motion suggested by "ゆれる."

example_sentences.kanji: 木の葉が揺れています。
example_sentences.furigana: 木(き)の葉(は)が揺(ゆ)れています。

translations.EN: The leaves of the tree are shaking.
translations.ES: Las hojas del árbol están temblando.
translations.TL: Ang mga dahon ng puno ay umuuga.
translations.MY: သစ်ပင်၏ အရွက်များလှုပ်လှုပ်ရှားရှားရှိနေသည်။
translations.HI: पेड़ की पत्तियाँ हिल रही हैं।
translations.FA: برگ‌های درخت در حال لرزش هستند.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼の話を聞いて気持ちが揺れた。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)の話(はなし)を聞(き)いて気持(きも)ちが揺(ゆ)れた。

translations.EN: Hearing his story, my feelings were shaken.
translations.ES: Al escuchar su historia, mis sentimientos se tambalearon.
translations.VI: Nghe câu chuyện của anh ấy, cảm xúc của tôi bị lung lay.
translations.FR: En écoutant son histoire, mes sentiments ont vacillé.
translations.NE: उनको कथा सुनेर, मेरो भावना चलायमान भयो।
translations.BN: তার গল্পটি শুনে আমার অনুভূতি কাঁপে।
translations.ZH: 听到他的故事，我的感情动摇了。
translations.TL: Nang marinig ang kanyang kuwento, nayanig ang aking damdamin.
translations.HI: उनकी कहानी सुनकर मेरा दिल डोल गया।
translations.AR: عندما استمعت إلى قصته، اهتزت مشاعري.
translations.FA: با شنیدن داستان او، احساسم تکان خورد.

example_sentences.furigana: 電車(でんしゃ)が揺(ゆ)れる。

translations.MY: ရထားလှုပ်တယ်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼女のことを考えると、僕の心が揺れる。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)のことを考(かんが)えると、僕(ぼく)の心(こころ)が揺(ゆ)れる。

translations.EN: When I think about her, my heart shakes.
translations.ES: Cuando pienso en ella, mi corazón se agita.
translations.VI: Khi nghĩ về cô ấy, trái tim tôi dao động.
translations.FR: Quand je pense à elle, mon cœur tremble.
translations.NE: उनीबारे सोच्छु अनि मेरो मन दुविधामा पर्छ।
translations.BN: তার কথা ভাবলেই আমার মন কেঁপে ওঠে।
translations.ZH: 想到她时，我的心会动摇。
translations.TL: Kapag iniisip ko siya, nanginginig ang aking puso.
translations.MY: သူ့ကို စဉ်းစားတဲ့အခါ သင့်ရဲ့နှလုံးသား လှုပ်ခတ်နေတာပါ။
translations.HI: जब मैं उसके बारे में सोचता हूं, मेरा दिल डगमगाने लगता है।
translations.FA: وقتی به او فکر می‌کنم، قلبم می‌لرزد.

example_sentences.furigana: 木(き)の葉(は)が風(かぜ)に揺(ゆ)れる。

translations.EN: The leaves sway in the wind.
translations.ES: Las hojas se balancean con el viento.
translations.VI: Lá cây rung rinh trong gió.
translations.TL: Ang mga dahon ay sumasayaw sa hangin.
translations.MY: အရွက်တွေကို လေနဲ့လှုပ်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: पेड़ की पत्तियाँ हवा में झूलती हैं।

example_sentences.furigana: 木(き)が雨(あめ)で揺(ゆ)れます。

translations.EN: The tree sways in the rain.
translations.ES: El árbol se balancea con la lluvia.
translations.FR: L'arbre se balance sous la pluie.
translations.MY: အသီးအရွက်သည် ရာသီဥတုတွင် အလှည့်ကျသည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)の声(こえ)がゆれた。

translations.MY: သူ၏ အသံ က နာရီလေး ထသော။

meanings_translations.VI: Chao đảo: trở nên không ổn định.
